game.name: Train Simulator: DB BR 442 'Talent 2' EMU Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The new generation BR 442 ‘Talent 2’ comes to Train Simulator, perfect for you to experience on the Munich – Garmisch-Partenkirchen route.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The new generation BR 442 ‘Talent 2’ comes to Train Simulator, perfect for you to experience on the Munich – Garmisch-Partenkirchen route.
